common_2010_friend_01: Hah, looks like the hero’s finally here![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_head_teacher_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Would you join us,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_botan_01: We’re in for an earful, aren’t we.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_2010_rival_01: Guess we’ll find out soon enough![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_head_teacher_02:
No need for concern, you two. I’m not angry in
the slightest.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_03:
I merely called you all here to discuss your fine
achievements in this year’s Treasure Hunt.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_04a:
You shut down the professor’s time machine
and thus prevented the ancient Pokémon from\r
running rampant across Paldea.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_04b:
You shut down the professor’s time machine and
thus prevented the Pokémon from the future from\r
running rampant across Paldea.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_05:
Your actions were truly outstanding in every
regard, and I couldn’t be prouder of you all.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_06:
Though your decision to enter a strictly off-limits
area was admittedly...regrettable.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_07:
However. Since this was necessary to protect
Paldea and its precious ecosystems, I am willing\r
to overlook that particular point.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_botan_02:
Phew... So we’re not getting raked over the coals
after all.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_2010_head_teacher_11:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh! Before I forget, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)],\r
there’s\r
something\r
I\r
would\r
like\r
you\r
to have.\c
Each of your friends has received one already,
so this one is for you.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_08:
Oh, and about the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Hall of Fame Badge[VAR COLOR(0000)] I gave you
a short while ago—that gift is one we bestow only\r
upon students who achieve truly remarkable feats.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_09:
I expect you to honor what that badge represents
by striving always to serve as a model for your\r
fellow students.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_10a:
Splendid. Such enthusiasm will surely take you far
in life.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_10b:
Oh? Well...I suppose you must be rather worn out
from your recent adventures.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_10:
And, Master Arven...I was so sorry to hear about
the professor. You have my deepest condolences.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_friend_03a:
Yeah, it was pretty rough when I found out my
mom had died...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_03b:
Yeah, it was pretty rough when I found out my
dad had died...[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_04:
But weirdly enough, my head actually feels
clear now. For the first time in ages.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_05:
In the Great Crater, I got to learn a bit about my
mom’s research and what she was trying to\r
achieve down there.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_05b:
In the Great Crater, I got to learn a bit about my
dad’s research and what he was trying to achieve\r
down there.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_06:
I guess if you’re building something as mind-
blowing as a time machine, that takes priority\r
over showering your son with attention, huh?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_07:
All I know is I’m done feeling like some lost little
kid. Done. Time to say good-bye and move on.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_friend_08:
I’m gonna enjoy every last day till graduation
with my buds here—and Mabosstiff, ’course![VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_head_teacher_11a:
Well said, Master Arven. You truly are your
mother’s son.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_11b:
Well said, Master Arven. You truly are your
father’s son.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_12:
Of course, I must remind you that you’ve
nowhere near enough credits to graduate.\c
You’ll need to study frantically to catch up, but I
have every expectation of your success.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_13:
And let us not forget the other good news!
Our academy has a new Champion![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_14:
Though we sadly cannot make your valiant
deeds in the Great Crater known to the public,\r
your new Champion Rank, at least, should be\r
celebrated throughout the whole school![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_rival_03:
Oooh! I know how we should celebrate! We
should hold a Pokémon battle contest![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_head_teacher_15: A Pokémon battle contest, you say...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_16:
While your own vested interests in such a venture
are more than apparent, Miss Nemona, I think\r
it’s a fine idea![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_head_teacher_17:
But please understand that a large-scale event
will be quite beyond us. We’ve many other\r
school activities to keep an eye on, after all...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_top_01: Pardon my intrusion. I couldn’t help but overhear.[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_2010_top_02:
The Pokémon League will, of course, happily
lend a hand in organizing this contest.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_head_teacher_18: Well, well! A most kind offer, Chairwoman Geeta.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_top_03:
I do everything in my power to nurture young,
up-and-coming talent.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_04:
Though that’s not to say only the youth have
promise when it comes to Pokémon battles.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_05:
A former Gym Leader... The developer of the
Pokédex app... This academy clearly counts many\r
skilled Trainers of Pokémon among its staff.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_06: As such, my suggestion is as follows...[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_07:
Students AND staff should compete for the title
of strongest Trainer at the academy![VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_rival_05:
Whoaaa! We’d get to battle the TEACHERS!
You’d compete too, right, Primera?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_friend_11:
Is that even allowed? The chairwoman’s not part
of the academy, right?[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_botan_04:
Aaactually, I think she’s the chairwoman of the
school board as well as of the Pokémon League...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_2010_friend_12:
Wait, for real? I mean, I knew she was on another
level, but...wow.[VAR 0114(0006)]
common_2010_top_08:
Thank you for the invitation, Champion Nemona.\c
I would gladly take up your kind offer to compete
alongside you all, but...[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_09:
I’m afraid my schedule is already packed tight
with work that I simply must attend to.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_rival_09: Awww! Can’t you free up some time somehow?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_top_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well... I suppose I might be able to participate if
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)] would agree\r
to\r
lend\r
me\r
a\r
hand\r
with\r
my work...?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_11:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Excellent answer. Much obliged, Champion
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_12:
To get straight to it, I would like you to go out
and inspect Paldea’s various Gyms in my stead.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_13:
Are they fulfilling their duties as beacons of
strength and inspiration for all those aiming\r
to achieve Champion Rank?\c
Or has their brilliance started to fade?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_14:
To find this out, I ask that you bring your full
might as Champion to bear against each of the\r
Gym Leaders and test their prowess in battle.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_15:
They are all Trainers of exceptional talent,
handpicked by me personally.\c
I do not expect you’ll find any cracks in their
armor, but...well. Consider it a formality.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_16:
This will also provide the perfect stage for your
first appearance as a new Champion.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_top_17:
Since all the Gym Leaders will still be expecting
me to carry out the inspection, I imagine they’ll\r
have mustered their full strength.\c
I daresay they might be more of a challenge than
when you faced them before.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_rival_06:
You get to have all-out battles with the Gym
Leaders?! Man, I’m jealous...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_top_18:
Now then, on to another crucial matter.\c
I’d like to discuss with Penny here how to patch
the weaknesses in our League Point system.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_botan_05:
Um. But...there’s a bunch of anime I’ve missed
that I was just...gonna...binge...[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_2010_top_19:
Thank you in advance for your willing and
eager cooperation.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_botan_06: Gah—I mean...I’ll d-do it. I’ll help. Let me help.[VAR 0114(0008)]
common_2010_top_20:
Excellent. We’ll leave you all to it, then. Come
now, Penny.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2010_rival_07:
This is awesome, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!\c
Show this inspection thing who’s boss so that
La Primera can join our tournament, OK?\c
And enjoy taking another swing at the Gym
gauntlet while you’re at it![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_rival_08:
I’ll take care of filling out the forms and other
administrative stuff so the ball gets rolling on the\r
tournament in the meantime![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2010_head_teacher_19:
I say, it’s wonderful to see you all showing such
initiative. You each have a critical role to play.\c
Penny assisting the League, our new Champion
inspecting Gyms, Nemona arranging the event...\r
Give it your best, everyone![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2010_friend_14:
Guess my role’s so obvious it goes without
saying?[VAR 0114(0006)]
